description: This mushroom burger is spicy, cheesy and full of bite.
name: Spicy Mushroom Burger Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 large portobello mushroom, washed and drained
1 small white onion, peeled and finely diced
2 cloves garlic, peeled and finely diced
4 medium brioche buns, sliced in half
4 leaves iceberg lettuce, washed, drained and torn

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Combine the butter with the finely diced onions, garlic, salt and pepper.
Place the butter inside the portabello mushrooms evenly and bake in the oven in a baking dish for 20 minutes.
Remove from the oven and flip the mushrooms over and baste the other side of the mushroom with the juices.
Bake for a further 10 minutes while you toast your brioche buns for 3 minutes.
Place the lettuce, tomato and cheese on the buns and then add the roasted mushrooms before serving.
